extension.valueString:
define "ConfirmedCovid":
  ["Condition": "C19HCC Confirmed COVID19 Infection"] CovidDiagnosis
    where CovidDiagnosis.onset overlaps "Measurement Period"

relatedArtifact.display: Value set C19HCC Confirmed COVID19 Infection

name: ConfirmedCOVIDPatients
title: ConfirmedCOVIDPatients
publisher: Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health
description: Measure to report all confirmed COVID cases per Location

author.name: Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health

coding.display: Disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (disorder)
This group reports on Hospital Acquired COVID-19 Infections
Patients with confirmed COVID-19 in any location.

extension.valueString:
define "ICU Beds Staffed Capacity":
  [Device] Bed
    where Bed.type ~ "ICU beds [#]"

define "ICU Beds":
  ICUBeds."ICU Beds Staffed Capacity"

name: ICUBedStaffedCapacity
title: ICUBedStaffedCapacity
publisher: Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health
description: Staffed ICU Beds capacity for a given Location

author.name: Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health

coding.display: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are available

extension.valueString:
define "ICU Beds Occupied":
  [Device] Bed
    where Bed.type ~ "Intensive care unit beds occupied [#]"

name: ICUBedCurrentOccupancy
title: ICUBedCurrentOccupancy
publisher: Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health

author.name: Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health

coding.display: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied

extension.valueString:
define "ICU Beds Occupied":
  [Device] Bed
    where Bed.type ~ "Intensive care unit beds occupied [#]"

define "ICU Beds Staffed Capacity":
  [Device] Bed
    where Bed.type ~ "ICU beds [#]"

define "Initial Population":
  ICUBeds."ICU Beds Staffed Capacity"

name: ICUBedsReporting
title: ICUBedsReporting
publisher: Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health
description: Proportion measure to report ICU bed capacity and occupancy

author.name: Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health

coding.display: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are available
Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are available
Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied
